1.summary: Remarks should support markup like a README
1.remarks:
# Markdown Support Implementation

## Features Added

• **Bold text** support with `**text**`
• *Italic text* support with `*text*`
• `Code snippets` with backticks
• Multi-line code blocks with triple backticks
• Bullet lists with `-` or `*`
• Numbered lists
• > Blockquotes for important notes

## Technical Implementation

The task manager now supports:
- Markdown parsing using the `markdown` library
- HTML to plain text conversion for display
- Multi-line remarks input
- Proper formatting preservation

## Usage Examples

When creating or updating tasks, you can now use:

```
**Important**: This is a critical task
*Note*: This is a note
`code`: This is inline code
```

> This feature makes task remarks much more readable and organized!

## Status: ✅ COMPLETED

This task has been successfully implemented and tested.
